00059 #include "nut_io.h"
00060 
00061 #include <sys/nutdebug.h>
00062 #include <io.h>
00063 
00068 
00081 int fgetc(FILE * stream)
00082 {
00083     uint8_t ch;
00084     int rc;
00085 
00086     NUTASSERT(stream != NULL);
00087     if (stream->iob_flags & _IOUNG) {
00088         stream->iob_flags &= ~_IOUNG;
00089         return stream->iob_unget;
00090     }
00091     if ((rc = _read(stream->iob_fd, &ch, 1)) != 1) {
00092         if (rc) {
00093             /* Error. */
00094             stream->iob_flags |= _IOERR;
00095         }
00096         else {
00097             /* Time out or end of file. */
00098             stream->iob_flags |= _IOEOF;
00099         }
00100         return EOF;
00101     }
00102     return (int) ch;
00103 }
